item.title: Advertising sign blocking visibility of road and buses, 17th November
item.description:
There is a digital advertising sign near bus stop Y. It gets busy there so you don't often get to stand in the bus stop. Between the close advertising sign, plus one further up; you can see the buses coming when standing in or behind the stop. You can only see buses if you go to edge of the road, but then you're in the way of people getting buses before you. If it comes up for review, it might worth removing, shrinking or rotating the sign so it's not so much of a blocker.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, High Street, Widmore, Bromley, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping - area around Angerstein roundabout, 17th November
item.description:

item.title: Signs and barriers from roadworks not collected, 17th November
item.description:
Work was carried out on 10th November to re-tarmac around a manhole cover. The barriers, signs and cone have been left in place since and are blocking access to number 15 and causing inconvenience to the rest of the close. As the work has presumably finished please could the barriers etc be removed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oaklands Close, Poverest, Orpington, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet
